Package com.ad4screen.sdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    A4S.Callback<T>
    Callback used to return an operation result asynchronously
    A4S.MessageCallback
    Callback used to return an Inbox Message asynchronously
    A4SIdsProvider
    Interface that you can use in order to dynamically provide partnerId and private key to Ad4Push SDK
    This interface must return as fastest as possible
    NEVER DO ANY LONG RUNNING OPERATIONS HERE
    In order to use it:
    1) Remove meta data com.ad4screen.partnerid and com.ad4screen.privatekey from your manifest
    2) Add the following meta data to A4SService tag :
    <meta-data android:name="com.ad4screen.idsprovider" android:value="your.package.MyA4SIdsProvider" />
    Please note that if your provider return null values, SDK will not start and will retry to get a partner id/private key by calling your provider every 10 sec
    A4SPopup.OnPopupCreatedListener  
    A4SService.A4SContext  
    Message.onIconDownloadedListener
    Return bitmap associated with this image as soon as the image of this Message is downloaded on this Device.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    A4S
    Root class presenting Ad4Screen SDK functionalities.
    A4SApplication
    Eases use of Application in cunjunction with Ad4Screen SDK.
    A4SIDFVHandler
    BroadcastReceiver used to retrieve custom A4S IDFV.
    A4SInterstitial  
    A4SPopup  
    A4SPopup.PopupCreated  
    A4SService
    Service launched by Ad4Push SDK.
    A4SWebView
    A4S Webview
    Use it to track any webview with Ad4Push SDK
    Constants
    Various global SDK constants
    FacebookReceiver  
    GCMHandler
    BroadcastReceiver used by Ad4Screen to retrieve GCM Token and handle GCM Message.
    Inbox
    This inbox contains all messages requested by a developer for one or more users.
    Log
    Ad4Screen central logging facility.
    Message
    Inbox Message
    Please see :
    		Message.Button
    Inbox Message Button
    Please see :
    		ReferrerHandler
    Broadcast Receiver used in order to send referrer informations to Ad4Screen.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Message.MessageContentType
    Content Type of this Message.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Tag
    Tag your activity with a human-readable name useable as Ad4Push InApp target
    Usage @Tag(name = "MainMenu") class MainActivity extends LaunchActivity { // ... }
